entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
